SELECT com03_day as com03Day, /** 일*/ com03_weekday as com03Weekday, /** 요일*/ com03_biz_yn as com03BizYn, /** 영업일여부*/ com03_note as com03Note /** 비고*/ FROM com03_date WHERE 1=1 AND com03_day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{closeDate} ORDER BY com03_day
